description: Try our easy to follow Cheesy Garlic & Herb Buns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot cross buns,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Apr 2020,Baking,Easter
name: Cheesy Garlic & Herb Buns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp fresh thyme leaves (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Cut a deep crisscross pattern into tops of hot cross buns. Place buns in a baking dish so they fit snuggly and are just touching.
In a small bowl, combine butter, 2 tsp thyme leaves, rosemary and garlic. Brush cut surfaces of buns with butter mixture.
Scatter over cheddar. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and cheese has melted. Serve buns topped with extra thyme leaves.
